entry.title: Eastbound
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightDraft

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,802Chapters: 35/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Evan Buckley never saw it coming.Not the kiss.Not the silence that followed.And certainly not the storm that would change everything, just hours later. Eddie Díaz never saw it coming.Not the phone call.Not Christmas with his parents.And certainly not the way both would change everything. Christopher Diaz never saw it coming.His dad and Buck building a life under one roof.Buck back at the 118, doing what he was born to do.And now… the world is about to see their story.  EASTBOUND is told in three parts that together form a single complete story. Or…Buck and Eddie navigate loss, secrets, and challenges, stepping into their future together.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,781Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,071Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,357Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: the long way home
entry.summary:
Author: cowboygogetem

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,261Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 199

Summary: The guy stares at him, then laughs. “Wow. You do that often?”Eddie squints at him, deadpan. “Only when city boys run into barns without a plan.”The guy grins. “I did have a plan. Run in. Get the cattle out.”Eddie scoffs.“You were waving your arms around like a windmill in a hurricane.”“Well, it worked. Handsome cowboy showed up and saved the day.”Eddie looks away, lips twitching despite himself.“Name’s Buck.”“Eddie.”OREddie is content with the cowboy life until he meets city firefighter, Buck, and everything that Eddie thought he knew about himself starts to unravel.

entry.title: The Kendall Calendar
entry.summary:
Author: Jvp1t3rthyf4g

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,298Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Maddie's eyes widen as she sees a face shes tried so hard to forget. Even worse is the fact that her boyfriend is just casually chatting with him, as if he hadn't helped her through panic attacks because of him."Mads, you okay?" Her brother's voice echoes through her head."Please tell me I'm not hallucinating, Buck." She whispers so quiet, Buck almost doesn't hear her. she points at the man. The husband she had left, escaped, just chatting with her new partner."Is that... Doug?"

entry.title: People Who Need People
entry.summary:
Author: AmZamReads

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,900Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: The alarm goes off and it only worsens Eddie’s already awful circumstance. He hears the team rushing out and eventually the firehouse is still again, and Eddie just lets himself open the floodgates. Sobs rack through his body, tears pouring out of his eyes and Eddie can barely breathe, his body overwhelmed by the ringing and the pain that comes with it. The migraine blooming deeper. His stomach does flips and he quickly grabs a nearby trashcan and starts dry heaving. They haven’t had a whole lot of chances to eat today so very little comes up, but his body keeps trying to expel his insides and it makes his head pound. Eddie keeps weeping, letting it out hoping that after his body will be exhausted enough to sleep, hoping the tension in his body is shed along with the tears. The he hears a soft knocking on the bunk room door with the handle turning, “Hey Eds-“ - Buck finds Eddie in the middle of a migraine episode and Buck does what Buck does best and takes care of Eddie.

entry.title: It's Quiet Uptown
entry.summary:
Author: napkin_soup

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,600Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 9

Summary: Eddie is hit with a flash of hope as he studies the boy and the way he’s holding on to the woman, his converse familiar. Maybe he’s okay, miraculously delivered right to him, safe and in one piece. If it’s Chris, he thinks, I will never miss Sunday mass again. “Christopher?” Eddie says, moving towards the woman and the boy. Maybe he’s crazy, in his grief. Maybe he needs just one more moment of hope before he can accept his son is gone. Maybe it's really him.The boy lifts his head. And it isn’t Chris.~~~Chris and Buck get separated during the Tsunami. Buck makes it to the VA that night. Christopher doesn't.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,031Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 174

Summary: When the sniper kills Eddie, Buck discovers he was given custody of Chris. After a grueling custody battle with Eddie's parents, he finally has begun to move on, but when he dies in a car crash, he gets the choice to join the one he loves or choose to return.He chooses to join Eddie.But what he doesn't know is that Eddie had chosen to go back to the beginning.(A time travel fix-it where an AU Buck and Eddie go back to season one. A remix of my fic Da Capo.)

entry.title: In Another Life
entry.summary:
Author: whiskey_princess13

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,895Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: “Your father’s been relocated for work.” Margaret speaks up, sitting down at one of the chairs by the island. “Rel- What does that mean?” Evan stands in the doorway, one hand on the wall. “Are we- Are we moving?” “Yes.” Phillip responds simply. “My boss wants me down in Texas in two weeks, so we’ve already got the house listed.” “Two- *Two weeks?!* Evan stands up straighter, crossing his arms over his chest. “What about school? I’m in the middle of summer school!” “We’ve talked with your principal already. He’s transferring your credits over to La Salle High School in El Paso. You start there next month when school starts.” -------Or, The buckley's move down to texas where Evan meets Eddie and Shannon in high school and they become a close knit trio of friends
